ing: 8 slices OSCAR MAYER Bacon, cooked, crumbled
des: "We've never met a BLT we didn't like, and our tortilla version is no exception. All the elements of the classic, rolled and cut into bite-size pieces to share with your peeps."
ins:
Mix cream cheese and mayo in medium bowl. Add bacon and tomatoes; mix well.
Spread onto tortillas; top with lettuce. Roll up tightly.
Cut each into 7 diagonal slices.
